Reviews.Title: “new hotel, great rooms, but deserted location”

Reviews.Content: hotel modern interior design comfy bed price affordable nice modern gym pool bad isolated location walk mrt mall construction door fix issue shower separate stall tub wifi spotty timed lot hard taxi lobby

Reviews.Title: “Think green!”
Reviews.Author: RideIndian
Reviews.Content: hotel refreshing change cbd hotels glimpses lovely greenery singapore offer vista mrt closeness shopping eating rochester park holland village makes truly worth commute cbd headed parks jurong convenient toothe appointed tasteful modern furniture furnishings upgraded single bedroom suite practically household entertainment gadgets desires free wifi coffee shop lots coming feel fresh views beautiful treetops lovely university opposite maybe feature heavy read fire door living bed narrow passage washroom staying guest irritating moving besides giving workout suggest check deals promotions internet prices vary widely walkins staff werent able explain booking vs rack rate didnt pursue thanks upgrade de top stay nice feel itand ofcourse facilites pool gym pretty neat

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and convenient”
Reviews.Author: David A
Reviews.Content: business trip singapore staying hotel weeks week pleased designed compact beds comfortable wireless access reliable location near science park extremely convenient buses mrt close win 5 minutes restaurants hotel runner garden 10k round trip fitness equipment including 4 treadmills towels staff friendly helpful return definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”

Reviews.Content: hotel front desk staff ready example check identification card staff passport told bring hubbys ic photocopy left staff holding little disorganized staff polite stayed superior nice 2 persons bed comfortable design nice clean loved window ceiling floor wifi fast included package hotel minutes walk mrt gym huge pool nice drawback restaurant food available hotel overall happy satisfied

Reviews.Title: “Messy service but nice room made up for it”

Reviews.Content: pre booking hotel staff properly trained called main line week 31 dec enquire told booked call reservations directly instead day tried calling reservations dept answered tried luck font desk told available twin didnt book cos king tried calling reservations finally answered told king available info confirm dvd player stated website confirmed front desk told suites dvd players frustrated info staff decided ahead book hotels singapore booked following day reservations called upgrade bedroom suite requested dvd joyous season managed appease lack service previously day check crowded people waiting lobby service staff flustered unlike usual hotels promptly unfortunately didnt manage past lift card didnt lift hotel staff card didnt offered management card allow access level change card followed card didnt door card didnt lift access definitely didnt door hotel staff card help door surprise imagine shocked seeing strangers breaking luckily werent doing private starting irritated inform situation reminded upgraded bedroom suite surprised dont understand hotel voucher supposed bedroom suite explain reservations promised blah blah voucher blah blah occupied told wait settle finally empty saving grace nice spacious bedroom suite forget unpleasantness day late check price availability front desk call twice cos didnt late check procedures hotel procedures firmly staff properly trained staff nice dont
